text: Jonas De Roeck (born 20 December 1979) is a Belgian former footballer and manager. De Roeck started his professional career with Antwerp in 1999 and spent several seasons with other Belgian clubs such as Lierse, Germinal Beerschot and Gent before moving to Germany with FC Augsburg. He returned in the summer of 2012 when he signed with Oud-Heverlee Leuven, where he stayed for one season before moving back to Antwerp. ==References== ==External links== * Belgium stats at Belgian FA * * * Jonas De Roeck at Footballdatabase Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgian expatriate footballers Category:Cobham F.C. players Category:Royal Antwerp F.C. players Category:Lierse S.K. players Category:Beerschot A.C. players Category:K.A.A.
